content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains instructions for processing a timely received request for withdrawal of an initial claim that VA associates with the corresponding claims folder
before
issuing a decision notice, including
processing a request for withdrawal of an initial claim
in its entirety
, and
when the request does not apply to all pending contentions
, and
notifying a claimant that VA has processed a withdrawn claim request
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section F - Withdrawal of Initial Claims
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section F
